cs.DS, cs.OR, cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with optimization problems in supply-chain management, which is a topic that falls under the category of operations research (cs.OR). The problem studied in the paper involves scheduling orders to minimize costs, which is a common problem in the field of algorithms and complexity (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the integrality gap of a linear-program relaxation, which is a topic in the field of information theory (cs.IT). Additionally, the paper uses computer-assisted methods to obtain stronger lower bounds, which is a topic in the field of computational complexity (cs.CC). Finally, the paper presents approximation algorithms, which is a topic in the field of machine learning (cs.LG).
